summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 2.2°C) and feels like temperature (down 1.7°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 643 m), light levels (up 3023 lux), and rainfall (up 0.1 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1593 m), rainfall (up 0.1 mm), and light levels (up 5051 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 643.2m lower than yesterday, 537.6m lower than the past week, 1593.0m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 1059m and a high of 3380m, averaging 1081.0m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: Cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and near calm conditions. Chance of light rain, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and periods of sunshine are expected. Weather could become unsettled.
